name: @kokotree-inc/videojs-upnext-plugin
description: Video.js UpNext plugin that enables auto-play of next video and shows an end card after the main video has ended.

scripts.prebuild: echo Running pre build && node -p "'export const PLUGIN_VERSION = ' + JSON.stringify(require('./package.json').version) + ';'" > src/version.ts && test -e tmp/build.version || touch tmp/build.version && date > tmp/build.version
scripts.publish-yalc-and-copy-css: npm run publish:yalc && npm run copy:css
scripts.change: echo Files Changed && npm run prebuild && echo Starting Webpack && webpack --mode production --no-watch && wait-on dist && npm run publish-yalc-and-copy-css && npm run copy:build-version-to-demo
scripts.watch: npm run prebuild && webpack --mode production --no-watch && onchange --exclude 'src/tmp' --exclude 'src/version.ts' 'package.json' 'src' -- npm run change
scripts.prepublish: rm -f dist/build.version dist/version.d.ts && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp docs/README.md dist/README.md
scripts.publish-lib: npm run build && npm run prepublish && cd ./dist && npm publish --access=public
